        private int[] random(int length)
        (Psuedo-)Randomiser for the place() function
        Parameters:
        length - Length of the Ship
        Returns:
        A 1-Dimensional array storing the X- and Y-Coordinates. 1st Integer is the Y-Coordinate. 2nd Integer is the X-Coordinate
